ðŸ“– Summary: Wazuh is an open-source security platform that provides XDR and SIEM capabilities. It uses agents deployed on monitored systems to collect and analyze data, integrated with the Elastic Stack for visualization. Key features include intrusion detection, log analysis, file integrity monitoring, vulnerability detection, configuration assessment, and incident response, enabling comprehensive security monitoring and threat management.
